      • processStatelessHeaderDocument

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response processStatelessHeaderDocument(InputStream inputStream,
                                                       boolean consolidate,
                                                       boolean htmlFormat)
        Uploads the origin document which shall be extracted into TEI and extracts only the header data.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the data of origin document
        consolidate - consolidation parameter for the header extraction
        htmlFormat - if the result has to be formatted to be displayed as html
        Returns:
        a response object which contains a TEI representation of the header part

                              throws SAXException,

        Returns:

      • processStatelessBulkHeaderDocument

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response processStatelessBulkHeaderDocument(InputStream inputStream)
        Uploads the zip file, extract pdf files and extract them into TEI. Only the header data is extracted.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - zip containing the datas of origin document.
        Returns:
        Response containing the TEI files representing the header part.

      • processStatelessFulltextDocument

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response processStatelessFulltextDocument(InputStream inputStream,
                                                         boolean consolidate,
                                                         boolean htmlFormat,
                                                         int startPage,
                                                         int endPage,
                                                         boolean generateIDs)
        Uploads the origin document which shall be extracted into TEI.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the data of origin document
        consolidate - the consolidation option allows GROBID to exploit Crossref web services for improving header information
        htmlFormat - if the result has to be formatted to be displayed as html.
        startPage - give the starting page to consider in case of segmentation of the PDF, -1 for the first page (default)
        endPage - give the end page to consider in case of segmentation of the PDF, -1 for the last page (default)
        generateIDs - if true, generate random attribute id on the textual elements of the resulting TEI
        Returns:
        a response object mainly contain the TEI representation of the full text

      • processStatelessFulltextAssetDocument

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response processStatelessFulltextAssetDocument(InputStream inputStream,
                                                              boolean consolidate,
                                                              int startPage,
                                                              int endPage,
                                                              boolean generateIDs)
        Uploads the origin document which shall be extracted into TEI + assets in a ZIP archive.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the data of origin document
        consolidate - the consolidation option allows GROBID to exploit Crossref web services for improving header information
        htmlFormat - if the result has to be formatted to be displayed as html.
        startPage - give the starting page to consider in case of segmentation of the PDF, -1 for the first page (default)
        endPage - give the end page to consider in case of segmentation of the PDF, -1 for the last page (default)
        generateIDs - if true, generate random attribute id on the textual elements of the resulting TEI
        Returns:
        a response object mainly contain the TEI representation of the full text

      • processCitationPatentTEI

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.StreamingOutput processCitationPatentTEI(InputStream pInputStream,
                                                        boolean consolidate)
        Process a patent document encoded in TEI for extracting and parsing citations in the description body.
        Parameters:
        pInputStream - The input stream to process.
        Returns:
        StreamingOutput wrapping the response in streaming while parsing the input.

                                                           boolean consolidate)
        Uploads the origin document, extract and parser all its references.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the data of origin document
        consolidate - if the result has to be consolidated with CrossRef access.
        Returns:
        a response object mainly contain the TEI representation of the full text
